# achievements

**Instance Property**

All achievements that have been associated with this activity.

## Declaration

```swift
var achievements: Set<GKAchievement> { get }
```

## Discussion

Progress of each achievement will be reported when the activity ends.

## Getting and removing achievements

- **removeAchievements(_:)**: Removes all achievements if they exist.
- **progress(on:)**: Get the achievement progress from a specific achievement of the local player if previously set.
- **setProgress(on:to:)**: Set a progress for an achievement for a player.
- **setAchievementCompleted(_:)**: Set progress to 100% for an achievement for a player.
